item.description:
A few weeks ago a few of us made it up to the roof, now let's head down below...to the bar at Morton's for their Power Hour, actually it is 1 1/2 hours.

Morton's offers specially priced beer, wine, spirits starting at just $4 and 'Bar Bites' starting at just $5 a plate from 5pm to 6:30pm.

Power Hour

Join happy hour friends for conversation, laughs and good cheap eats.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 7.

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Copley subway station (green line) is closest, less than a (five (5) minute walk). Back Bay subway station (orange line and commuter rail) is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Below the first floor at the bar
item.name: Power Happy Hour Wednesday June 3rd
